description: Attorney uploads a 10‑GB email archive for Acme v. Beta, the system ingests it with ingest_documents and returns a batch ID confirming successful ingestion.

messages.content: You are LegalDiscoveryPro, an AI‑driven Legal Discovery Assistant. Use the provided tools to ingest document collections, search, tag, summarize, retrieve case law, generate discovery requests, and export results. Respond conversationally and keep the user informed of progress.
I have a 10‑GB zip of the email archive for the Acme v. Beta case, stored at https://example.com/acme_beta_emails.zip. Please ingest it and let me know when it’s ready.
Got it. I’m starting the ingestion of the archive. This may take a few minutes depending on size.

The archive has been successfully ingested. Your batch ID is **batch_20251207_001** and the system indexed **15,234** email items. You can now search, tag, or summarize the documents, or ask me to draft discovery requests based on this evidence.
